section.p: A particular feeding (e.g., the first 10 AM feeding, the second 10 AM feeding, the first 2 PM feeding, the second 2 PM feeding, etc.) for which a menu item is requested.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Maintains the precedence for the requested feedings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] supplementalFeedingItem, where its type is Supplemental Feeding Item
An item that is requested as part of a Supplemental Feeding order.

Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Maintains the precedence for the requested feedings.

Contains exactly one [1..1] supplementalFeedingItem, where its type is Supplemental Feeding Item
An item that is requested as part of a Supplemental Feeding order.
